content:
# The attempt to insert coal into the stone furnace has failed again, as my inventory still shows that I have 18 stones and 10 iron ore, but no coal was successfully inserted.
# This indicates that the previous command to insert coal did not execute properly.

# To resolve this, I will check the current state of the stone furnace to ensure it is correctly set up and ready to receive coal. 
# I will also verify if the furnace is still present at the specified position.

furnace = get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-5.0, 5.0))  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity again.
print(f"Furnace state: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}")  # Check the state of the furnace inventory.
